Bootstrap and Google Maps API

Apr 11, 2013

This post contains some information and two samples of Bootstrap (modals) and Google maps. For both samples, stack overflow posts (below under resources) were of great assistance. I hope all these resources in one place will help someone else.

UPDATE :

November 5, 2013: A new post is available to demo Bootstrap 3 with Google Maps.

October 26, 2013: After fixing the demos from moving hosts, I realized that the below demos will not work for the latest version of bootstrap. There will be a new post with updated code. In the mean time, please be aware that bootstrap 2.X is required.

Demos:

  • Single Map
  • Many maps (using one modal)
  • Download Code

Resources

  • Address to Latitude and Longitude: enter a full address of the coordinates you wish to find, and press "go".
  • Stack Overflow posts:
    http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8239372/google-maps-open-info-window-by-default
    http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11742839/showing-a-google-map-in-a-modal-created-with-twitter-bootstrap
    http://stackoverflow.com/questions/10626885/passing-data-to-a-bootstrap-modal/10635652#10635652
    http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8812268/grey-boxes-appear-in-parts-of-embedded-google-map-in-modal-box
  • Google maps in hidden div: shows to to fix improper cross browser display
